 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָמֵא‎</span>] **verb** ==be thirsty== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew (rare); so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">: Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ƒûmu***</u></abbr>, ***thirst***, etc.); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽמְאָה‎</span> [[Ps.42.3|Ps 42:3]]; [[Ps.63.2|Ps 63:2]] 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְצָמִת‎</span> consecutive [[Ruth.2.9|Ruth 2:9]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:75qq»§ 75qq</sup>); 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָמֵתִי‎</span> [[Judg.4.19|Judg 4:19]] ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:74k»§ 74k</sup>); 3 plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽמְאוּ‎</span> [[Isa.28.21|Isa 28:21]] ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצְמָא‎</span> [[Exod.17.3|Exod 17:3]]; [[Judg.15.18|Judg 15:18]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְמָ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצ‎</span> [[Job.24.11|Job 24:11]] 2 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּצְמָ֑אוּ‎</span> [[Isa.65.13|Isa 65:13]] — ***be thirsty*** [[Judg.4.19|Judg 4:19]]; [[Judg.15.18|Judg 15:18]]; [[Ruth.2.9|Ruth 2:9]]; [[Isa.48.21|Isa 48:21]]; [[Isa.49.10|Isa 49:10]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְעָ֑בוּ‎</span>), [[Isa.65.13|Isa 65:13]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְעָ֑בוּ‎</span>) [[Job.24.11|Job 24:11]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing, [[Exod.17.3|Exod 17:3]] ([[BDB#E|E]]); figurative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָֽמְאָה נַפְשִׁי לֵאלֹהִים‎</span>. [[Ps.42.3|Ps 42:3]] ***my soul thirsteth for God***, compare [[Ps.63.2|Ps 63:2]].
